sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
At a Common Councel holden in the Guild-hall London on VVednesday the 14th of December, 1659. City of London (England). Court of Common Council. Alleyne, Thomas, Sir, fl. 1660.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by James Flesher, Printer to the Honourable City of London, [London] : [1659]
Aleyn Mayor = Sir Thomas Alleyne, mayor of London in 1659-60. An order of the Common Council, for preserving the peace of the city at the forthcoming meeting of Parliament. Publication date from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "xber [i.e. December]. 15". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Aleyn Mayor = Sir Thomas Alleyne, mayor of London in 1659-60. An order of the Common Council, for preserving the peace of the city at the forthcoming meeting of Parliament. Publication date from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "xber [i.e. December]. 15". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
